settings.title: Settings
settings.text-confirm-restore: Are you sure you want to restore the default settings?
settings.text-export-backup: Export two files, one for modification and one for backup.

file-manager.title: File Manager
file-manager.description: View, delete, download or rename uploaded special files.
file-manager.message-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {0}? Please fill in the reason for deletion:
file-manager.message-download-confirm: Are you sure you want to download {0}? (File size: {1})

file-uploader.title: File Uploader
file-uploader.label-drop-files-here: Click or drag files here to upload
file-uploader.text-leave-warning-content: The upload is now in progress. Please do not leave this page.

data-exporter.title: Data Exporter
data-exporter.description: Export animation episode data from XYY Wiki to local.

data-importer.title: Data Importer
data-importer.description: Import animation episode data from local to XYY Wiki.
data-importer.bot-alert-text: You need to log in with a bot account to import data.
data-importer.bot-alert-is-bot: Current account is a bot account.
data-importer.bot-alert-not-bot: Current account is not a bot account.
data-importer.text-leave-warning-content: The import is now in progress. Please do not leave this page.
